wordGroup: costume jewelry （用作服饰的）人造珠宝
jewelry box 首饰盒；珠宝盒
jewelry store 珠宝店；金银手饰店

sentences.en: I asked him to have my jewelry valued.
sentences.cn: 我请求他为我的珠宝估价。

sentences.en: The one on the right wears jewelry.
sentences.cn: 右边的一个人戴着首饰。

sentences.en: We have purchased some valuable jewelry.
sentences.cn: 我们购置了几件贵重的珠宝饰物。
